content: Great support in a tough situation for the team. Of course the best way to prove the naysayers wrong is to “ship” and focus on that rather than the publicity negative or positive. The product sounds exciting and I hope it works — if so it will be a game changer. And if it doesn’t the world won’t end and as long as investors and employees went in eyes open that’s part of business. This is completely different from Theranos where the investigations are of possible misleading investor information and patient harm.
